actions.name: AcknowledgeJob
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified job and whether that job has been received by the job worker

actions.name: AcknowledgeThirdPartyJob
actions.description: Grants permission to confirm that a job worker has received the specified job (partner actions only)

actions.name: CreateCustomActionType
actions.description: Grants permission to create a custom action that you can use in the pipelines associated with your AWS account

actions.name: CreatePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to create a uniquely named pipeline

actions.name: DeleteCustomActionType
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a custom action

actions.name: DeletePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified pipeline

actions.name: DeleteWebhook
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a specified webhook

actions.name: DeregisterWebhookWithThirdParty
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the registration of a webhook with the third party specified in its configuration

actions.name: DisableStageTransition
actions.description: Grants permission to prevent revisions from transitioning to the next stage in a pipeline

actions.name: EnableStageTransition
actions.description: Grants permission to allow revisions to transition to the next stage in a pipeline

actions.name: GetActionType
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about an action type

actions.name: GetJobDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about a job (custom actions only)

actions.name: GetPipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a pipeline structure

actions.name: GetPipelineExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about an execution of a pipeline, including details about artifacts, the pipeline execution ID, and the name, version, and status of the pipeline

actions.name: GetPipelineState
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about the current state of the stages and actions of a pipeline

actions.name: GetThirdPartyJobDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to view the details of a job for a third-party action (partner actions only)

actions.name: ListActionExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the action executions that have occurred in a pipeline

actions.name: ListActionTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to list a summary of all the action types available for pipelines in your account

actions.name: ListDeployActionExecutionTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to list the deployment details for deploy action executions that have occurred in a pipeline

actions.name: ListPipelineExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to list a summary of the most recent executions for a pipeline

actions.name: ListPipelines
actions.description: Grants permission to list a summary of all the pipelines associated with your AWS account

actions.name: ListRuleExecutions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the rule executions that have occurred in a pipeline

actions.name: ListRuleTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to list a summary of all the rule types available for pipelines in your account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a CodePipeline resource

actions.name: ListWebhooks
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the webhooks associated with your AWS account

actions.name: OverrideStageCondition
actions.description: Grants permission to resume the pipeline execution by overriding a condition in a stage

actions.name: PollForJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about any jobs for CodePipeline to act on

actions.name: PollForThirdPartyJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to determine whether there are any third-party jobs for a job worker to act on (partner actions only)

actions.name: PutActionRevision
actions.description: Grants permission to edit actions in a pipeline

actions.name: PutApprovalResult
actions.description: Grants permission to provide a response (Approved or Rejected) to a manual approval request in CodePipeline

actions.name: PutJobFailureResult
actions.description: Grants permission to represent the failure of a job as returned to the pipeline by a job worker (custom actions only)

actions.name: PutJobSuccessResult
actions.description: Grants permission to represent the success of a job as returned to the pipeline by a job worker (custom actions only)

actions.name: PutThirdPartyJobFailureResult
actions.description: Grants permission to represent the failure of a third-party job as returned to the pipeline by a job worker (partner actions only)

actions.name: PutThirdPartyJobSuccessResult
actions.description: Grants permission to represent the success of a third-party job as returned to the pipeline by a job worker (partner actions only)

actions.name: PutWebhook
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a webhook

actions.name: RegisterWebhookWithThirdParty
actions.description: Grants permission to register a webhook with the third party specified in its configuration

actions.name: RetryStageExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to resume the pipeline execution by retrying the last failed actions in a stage

actions.name: RollbackStage
actions.description: Grants permission to rollback the stage to a previous successful execution

actions.name: StartPipelineExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to run the most recent revision through the pipeline

actions.name: StopPipelineExecution
actions.description: Grants permission to stop an in-progress pipeline execution

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a CodePipeline resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a CodePipeline resource

actions.name: UpdateActionType
actions.description: Grants permission to update an action type

actions.name: UpdatePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to update a pipeline with changes to the structure of the pipeline
